channel.title: Client freezes when teleporting
channel.description:
Idk why but when i teleport example to lumbridge the game freezes and i must refresh the website and login again ima give you link to the server: http://www.rswebclients.com/play/InsanityScape
U guys maybe can solve it we can talk in there and someone can help me:) thanks

item.title: Client freezes when teleporting
item.dc:creator: @T7S T7S
item.description:
@T7S wrote:

When you DC, it should show a CMD error, if you can give me that information, I could probably help. Just to make notice, if youâ€™re mixing a source with a different client which is not suited to your Source, it might be sending the wrong packet or something, just a thought.
